page.title: 08TARN NEWS, URSWICK, SCALES.
page.content: Examples from July edition of the Tarn News. See previous page for details. ALDINGHAM SCHOOL LEAVERS SERVICE. This will be held at St Cuthbert's at the end of term-date to be finalised. Everyone is most welcome to come and join the children. CONFIRMATION. Confirmation classes will be beginning within a few months. I invite any young people over the age of 12 years, and also adults to think prayerfully of offering themselves for preparation. Please let me know and ask for a form. The Rector, J Tait. RUSH QUEEN. To continue our tradition, we need a Rush Queen for the Rush- bearing on Sunday 29th September at 1.30pm. and the vicar would like the names of girls interested before the end of school term so that the Urswick Parochial Church Council can decide as soon as possible.
